title: Pagination Pattern
excerpt: Breaking content into manageable pages for improved navigation.
content:
Pagination is a design pattern used to divide content into separate pages. It's commonly used in search results, product listings, and long-form content to make large amounts of information more manageable and easier to navigate.

Key Components

  • Page numbers
  • Previous and Next buttons
  • First and Last page links
  • Items per page selector

Best Practices

  1. Keep navigation simple and intuitive
  2. Show the total number of pages
  3. Highlight the current page
  4. Consider using 'Load More' for infinite scrolling alternatives
  5. Ensure mobile responsiveness
